magpie.models.regression

Class GuessMeanRegression

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.models.BaseModel
      • magpie.models.regression.BaseRegression
        • magpie.models.regression.SingleGuessRegression
          • magpie.models.regression.GuessMeanRegression
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, AbstractRegressionModel, Citable, Commandable, Options, Printable, Savable

    public class GuessMeanRegression
extends SingleGuessRegression
    Always guess the mean of the values provided during training. User can add jitter in the same way as SingleGuessRegression.

    Usage: [-jitter <jitter>]
    value: Amount of random variation added to guess (default=0)

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
